TopicTitle: Rework a word so you will sound smart

Articles.Content:
Short, take the word apple, and write it like iron-fruit (yes apple has a lot of iron in it).

Ex:

Person one: Pencil.

Person two: Graphine and Wood writing instrument the next word is: Orange.

Person three: Citrus fruit the color of the sun.

if you don't understand yet. you take deform a word, and then write the previous word smartly.

Spoiler

Formula:

[Smart word]

The next word is: [Word]

alright, i'll start;

 

Electron flow without information in form of bits.

The next word is: Water

Examples include:

The Moving (Verb)

The Good, The Bad, and The Ugly (Adjectives)
